title: Black's picturesque tourist of Scotland.
snippet: The principal gentlemen's seats in the neighbourhood are — Granton, Larch-hill, Craigieburn, Dumcrieff, Craigielands, Auchincas, etc.

title: The complete poetical and prose works of Robert Burns:
author: Burns, Robert
snippet: The woods of Cragieburn and of Dumcrieff, were at one time favourite haunts of our poet.
